body_html:
Indeed that works @soumith thanks so much. Apparently even uses cudnn6 from the prints.

$ python3.5 pytorch_cudnn.py
Files already downloaded and verified
Files already downloaded and verified
Cudnn version: 6020
[1,  2000] loss: 2.172
[1,  4000] loss: 1.851
...

So that also means my earlier comment was wrong and I never installed for cuda 7.5 but whatever, it works now :)

body:
Indeed that works @soumith  thanks so much. Apparently even uses cudnn6 from the prints.

```
$ python3.5 pytorch_cudnn.py
Files already downloaded and verified
Files already downloaded and verified
Cudnn version: 6020
[1,  2000] loss: 2.172
[1,  4000] loss: 1.851
...
```

So that also means my earlier comment was wrong and I never installed for cuda 7.5 but whatever, it works now :)
